title: What is the hard part of being the maknae of a K-pop group? - Quora

response.answer_text: Haha! The pranks! There is one group that I follow A LOT more than other groups, and that kpop group is Got7 💚💚. 김유겸 (Kim Yugyeom) is the maknae of the group. You might have heard of him about being in a groupchat with other '97 idols, such as Jungkook of BTS and Bambam of Got7. There are multiple videos that have been posted by Got7 of them doing pranks on Yugyeom… it breaks my heart everytime 😭. But it's okay, because they make the endings funny and more lighthearted. 💚💚 아가새는 화이팅!
